Title: Teamspeak 3 Ez Admin
Description:
This new Teamspeak 3 Admin Tool makes it easier for Server Administrators to easily Administrate their teamspeak 3 server.
You'll no longer have to resort to others to use the ServerQuery Commands that you may not know.
It's developed in vb.net, and soon to be a wpf application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This new Teamspeak 3 Admin Tool makes it easier for Server Administrators to easily Administrate their teamspeak 3 server.
You'll no longer have to resort to others to use the ServerQuery Commands that you may not know.
It's developed in vb.net, and soon to be a wpf application.

Known Bugs:
None - This project is still in alpha phase
